message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product for $10000. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on a top-notch item that's sure to exceed your expectations. With its exceptional quality, it's a worthwhile investment that will pay for itself in the long run. What do you say, are you ready to take your business to the next level?
I'm not convinced yet, I need to see more before making a decision.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob. But let me ask you this: have you ever had to deal with the frustration of a low-quality product that didn't meet your standards? I'm offering you a chance to avoid that headache and get a product that will truly meet your needs. With its exceptional quality, you can trust that it will perform flawlessly and provide long-term value. Would you like to reconsider and take advantage of this rare opportunity?
I appreciate your sales pitch, but I still need to see more before making a decision. I'd like to wait and see what the next product has to offer.
